name: bills-claude-skills
description: A collection of custom Claude Code skills for Git workflow automation and GitHub PR management

plugins.name: github-pr-resolver
plugins.description: Automate GitHub pull request review resolution by processing ALL review comments and fixing ALL failing CI checks.

plugins.name: git-workspace-init
plugins.description: Initialize a new git worktree and branch for feature development or bug fixes.

commands.name: resolve-pr
commands.description: GitHub PR URL (e.g., https://github.com/owner/repo/pull/123) or PR number

commands.name: init-workspace
commands.description: Initialize a new git worktree. Usage: /init-workspace <type> <description> (e.g., /init-workspace feat user-auth)
